title: Is the reward of the Imam and followers the SAME? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Al from the UK is the reward of the IM and the followers the same no the the im's reward is greater because he's a leader and this is the role of the messengers may Allah peace and blessing be upon them and this is the role of the great imams and kfs so the role of the Imam is higher and greater than the role of the followers and Allah Knows Best
